articles.author: Mark O'Brien
articles.content:
The single dose Johnson & Johnson COVID-19 vaccine will soon be available in Ireland after it was given the green light by the European Medicines Agency.
The treatment will be available to peopl… [+1657 chars]
articles.description: The treatment will be available to people over 18 and becomes the fourth vaccine approved by the EMA
articles.title: Johnson & Johnson one shot COVID vaccine gets green light by European Medicines Agency - Dublin Live

articles.content: Britain has delayed by around six months its plans to introduce a range of post-Brexit border checks on goods imported from the European Union, saying it had listened to businesses which needed more … [+3163 chars]
articles.description: Britain has delayed by around six months its plans to introduce a range of post-Brexit border checks on goods imported from the European Union, saying it had listened to businesses which needed more time to prepare.
articles.title: EU 'no option but to take legal action over protocol' - RTE.ie
